definition: given or inflicted in requital according to merits or deserts
details:
adjective
- given or inflicted in requital according to merits or deserts
= example: given or inflicted in requital according to merits or deserts
= synonyms: vindicatory
- of or relating to or having the nature of retribution
= example: of or relating to or having the nature of retribution
= synonyms: vindicatory
